Text:
@ The_Day_Walker

how comes your encodes are low res (320x240)? they look pixelated on ipod touch/ iPhone, couldn't you do 480xXXX? instead plz
@ the day walker, how come ur uploads are low-res @320x240, cud u plz do them @480x???

@ nbdelboy - do all of my encodes look pixelated? If you could go in to more detail about it, it would be helpful. (^_^) 
The reason why I prefer 320x240 is cuz when watch it on any of my PSPs I can choose from 3-4 different display settings and I know that this res works on all the devices that I say it to work on. My stuff looks good on a XBOX360 and WDTV Media Player.

@ nbdelboy - I can try to encoding @ 480, I just hav had trouble in the past with it when using certain files codecs like mkv and a couple of others. I am currently learning how to encode with a couple of other programs like Handbrake with trial and error. (^_^)
Also I dont have an iPhone or an iPod Touch  and I dont know anyone close to me or that has one that could test my stuff out so I could get the best settings so it works on most devices. (^_^)

@ jsimp711 - Thanks for the support and, yes I will upload Entourage S03-S06. I am encoding the 3rd season right now, then I have to test it, so expect it to be uploaded in the next 24-48 hours.


@ Everyone - I plan on uploading these in the next 3-4 Days -
Tron (1982) (PSP, iPod, Zune)

I am also going to encode 1-3 seasons in the morning and maybe a few movies. (^_^)

@ the day walker, 

sorry i wasn't really clear, when watching them they look pixelated like say when you watch SD on a full 1080p HDTV, the size your encoding to is ipod classic size, half the size of the touch/iPhone screen, which is what i meant by pixelated
